Messages.Text:
**ATL Booking Information and Requirements** 🎯

__Booking Process__ 📅

• **All bookings must be made through a faculty advisor**
• **Reservations require 7-30 days advance notice**
• **Confirmation will be provided within 7 days of request**

Booking is easy! Just ask your faculty advisor to help you reserve a space.

**Summary** 📝: The booking process involves several steps and requirements to ensure smooth facility access! 📅✅

__Booking Requirements__ 📅

• **Minimum charge**: 4 hours per room
• **Fractions of an hour are treated as full hours**
• **Faculty advisor must submit the booking request**
• **Users must be eligible (students with faculty supervision, etc.)**

These requirements help us keep the lab running smoothly for everyone!

**Summary** 📝: The booking process involves several steps and requirements to ensure smooth facility access! 📅✅

__User Responsibilities__ 🤝

• **Be mindful while using rooms and equipment**
• **Responsible for any damage to facility property**
• **Switch off all electronic systems at the end of booking**
• **Keep the place clean and tidy**
• **Responsible for any irremovable marks**

We appreciate your help in keeping ATL a great place for everyone!

**Summary** 📝: These guidelines help ensure everyone has a positive experience and facilities remain in good condition! 🤝🌟

__XR Space__ 📌

**Basic Information** ℹ️
  • Area: 71.3 square meters
  • Capacity: 50 people

**Key Features** ✨
  • Explore the cross-border exchange between art and technology
  • XR Virtual Simulation System


Let me know if you want to book XR Space or need more details!

**Summary** 📝: This section provides important information about XR Space! 📌💡

**Summary** 📝: This section provides important information about Meeting Room! 📌💡

__Pricing Categories__ 💰

**Pricing** 💰
  • External Organizations: Highest rates
  • Non-UGC Non-Arts Programs: High rates
  • UGC Non-Arts Programs: Medium rates
  • Non-UGC Arts Programs: Lower rates
  • UGC Arts Programs: Fees waived


We offer different rates for different user types!

**Summary** 📝: Pricing varies based on user category, with different rates for different types of users! 💰📊

__Contact Information__ 📞

• **Email**: atlab@hku.hk
• **Phone**: (+852) 3917 5801
• **Location**: Run Run Shaw Tower (RRST-4.35), Centennial Campus

Reach out if you need help with booking or have any questions!

**Summary** 📝: Multiple contact channels are available for questions and support! 📞💬

__Which facility would you like to book?__ 📌

I can provide detailed pricing and information for any specific facility.

If you have more questions, feel free to ask! 😊
For further assistance, you may contact ATL staff. 📧

**🌐 Learn More Online**

**Venue & Pricing Information** 💰

Check venue availability and pricing details

🔗 **Learn More**: https://www.atlab.hku.hk/venue-info/

**General Information** 🎯

__Information about general__ 📌

The Arts Technology Lab (ATL) at HKU is a state-of-the-art facility that serves as a platform for students, faculty, and researchers to explore cutting-edge technology in the arts. It's affiliated with the Faculty of Arts at the University of Hong Kong and features various specialized spaces including XR environments, research rooms, and collaborative workspaces for interdisciplinary projects. Additional services include seating arrangement special setup for HK$1,000 (minimum 1 hour) and cleaning fee for HK$1,000 (minimum 1 hour). Both services are subject to availability and the duration is determined by the Arts Technology Lab at HKU.

Let me know if you need more specific details about general!

If you have more questions, feel free to ask! 😊
For further assistance, you may contact ATL staff. 📧
